fields.description:
I've tried to update a renewed Apple Push Notification Certificate through Appcelerator Dashboard (http://platform.appcelerator.com)
I upload the .p12 certificate and enter the certificate password but I get the error message " "password" is a required parameter‚Äù.
It's not really a password problem, because I can open this certificate without problems with this password ( "openssl pkcs12 -info -in myCertifcate.p12" )

I uploaded certificates several times without problems before. 
I have tried uploading other certificates for other apps and I get the same problem. 

So I won't be able to send Push Notifications to my iOS App Users without the new certificate.
fields.summary: Error renewing Apple Push Notification Certificate through Appcelerator Dashboard
